code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const TodoForm=_ref=>{let{onAdd}=_ref;const[task,setTask]=useState('');const[dueDate,setDueDate]=useState('');const[dueTime,setDueTime]=useState('');const handleSubmit=e=>{e.preventDefault();onAdd({task,dueDate,dueTime});setTask('');setDueDate('');setDueTime('');};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleSubmit,className:"todo-form",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",placeholder:"Task Title",value:task,onChange:e=>setTask(e.target.value),required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"date",value:dueDate,onChange:e=>setDueDate(e.target.value),required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"time",value:dueTime,onChange:e=>setDueTime(e.target.value),required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",children:"Add Task"})]});};export default TodoForm;
